title.zh: 影视数据库 | 石清琪

description.en: Qingqi's Movie Database (QMDB) is a tool to help you find ratings and reviews for the newest movie and TV shows.
description.zh: 石清琪的影视数据库 (QMDB) 是一个帮助您查找最新电影和电视剧评分与影评的工具。

titleTemplate.zh: %s | 影视数据库 | 石清琪

errorMessage.en: Sorry, couldn't afford to buy all the movies.
errorMessage.zh: 对不起，买不起所有的电影。

notFound.en: No movies found that match the criteria, please update the filters
notFound.zh: 没有找到符合条件的电影，请更新筛选条件

noResults.en: No results found for your search

chatInputPlaceholder.en: Ask about movies or TV shows...

clearConversationConfirm.en: Are you sure? This cannot be undone.
clearConversationConfirm.zh: 确定要清空吗？此操作无法撤销。

conversationLimitReached.en: Conversation limit reached. Please clear to continue.
conversationLimitReached.zh: 已达对话上限。请清空以继续。
